Hi! I'm Brenda.

Front End Developer and Project Lead based in Los Angeles.

I graduated with a degree in Computer Science and have always had a passion for design. Currently, I’m working as a Project Lead at Hello Design, where I oversee digital projects and manage internal teams.

When not online, you can find me hopping between local cafes and hiking spots, or rewatching Pixar movies with my Chocolate Lab.
